title: Cement in Lover’s Car Revenge?
subtitle: Did a man fill a Cadillac supposedly belonging to his wife's lover with concrete?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Man who drives a cement mixer for a living notices a strange car parked in his driveway and assumes the owner is having an affair with his wife; as revenge he fills the car with concrete, only to discover that the car was a present from his wife.
